title: Prime Minister Carney secures new agreements with the United Arab Emirates to expand trade and attract new investment into Canada

title: India, UAE move closer on easing visa policies, extradition and legal assistance
description:
India and the United Arab Emirates on Wednesday made progress in liberaling visa policies for travel between the two countries.
